steps.title: Call customer support to sign up or reset your password.
steps.content: Call customer support to sign up or reset your password. For general account support or to reset your password, call the customer support line. They are open Monday - Friday from 8 am to 12 am (EST) and Saturdays from 8 am to 10 pm (EST). [1] X Research source The customer support line number is 1-800-827-6364. If you have an account at AOL that you pay for, you can call this number 24 hours a day 7 days a week.

steps.title: Use AOL’s TTY services if you are deaf or hard of hearing.
steps.content: Use AOL’s TTY services if you are deaf or hard of hearing. If you need to call AOL and you have a Text Telephone, you can call a separate number to speak with a representative through your TTY device. You must have TTY enabled equipment to call this number. [2] X Research source Call 1-800-759-3323.

steps.title: Contact a Spanish-speaking customer service rep if you need to.
steps.content: Contact a Spanish-speaking customer service rep if you need to. If Spanish is your primary language, call the separate Spanish customer care line for AOL. You will be able to talk to a support person entirely in Spanish. [3] X Research source The Spanish customer care line is 1-866-885-5117.

steps.title: Email customer care for general support.
steps.content: Email customer care for general support. If you have questions about your account or need to address something that is not time-sensitive, send AOL customer support an email. They will reply to you within 24 to 72 hours. [4] X Research source Send an email to support@aol.com for help.

steps.title: Chat with AOL support if you are a paid member.
steps.content: Chat with AOL support if you are a paid member. Paid AOL members get access to a 24 hours a day, 7 days a week chat support line. You can chat with them through your AOL account after you log in or by going to https://get.aol.com/livesupport . [5] X Research source AOL Live Support also comes with security products to download on your computer.

steps.title: Contact AOL on Facebook or Twitter for a fast reply.
steps.content: Contact AOL on Facebook or Twitter for a fast reply. Instead of sending an email, you can use social media to send a message to AOL. Use direct messaging on either Facebook or Twitter to ask your question privately, or tag AOL in a Tweet or Facebook post to ask publicly. [6] X Research source AOL will not be able to help you with account or privacy questions over social media due to privacy reasons. AOL’s Facebook account is https://www.facebook.com/aol/ AOL’s Twitter account is https://twitter.com/aolsupporthelp

steps.title: Email their security team for emergency situations.
steps.content: Email their security team for emergency situations. If you have found a vulnerability in AOL’s system or you have discovered AOL data outside of their system, send an email to the security team. Your email will only be answered if the security team deems it a serious threat. Send an email to secvuln@teamaol.com for security issues.
